tool_description: Collects comprehensive table-level statistics including row counts, size metrics, and data distribution information.

connection_id.description: Database connection identifier from Database Connection Manager

schema_name.description: Database schema name to collect statistics from

table_names.description: Specific table names to analyze (if empty, analyzes all tables)

sampling_percentage.description: Percentage of rows to sample for analysis (1-100)

error_messages: Invalid connection: Connection ID not found or connection closed.
Schema not found: Specified schema does not exist in the database.
Access denied: Insufficient privileges to read table statistics.
Invalid sampling percentage: Must be between 1-100.
Table not found: One or more specified tables do not exist in the schema.
usage: Provide connection_id and schema_name to collect table statistics. Optionally specify table_names for targeted analysis or set sampling_percentage for large tables.

total_size_mb.description: Total size of analyzed tables in megabytes

largest_table.description: Name of the largest table by row count
